name: A Sound Strategy
overview: A Sound Strategy (ASSi)builds cost effective and easy to use solutions. siteMaster, the core of its proprietary system, has been available to online users since its inception. Users typically purchase a license and access the software via the internet, thus eliminating the need to monopolize storage space, all the while offering 24/7 accessibility to users located anywhere with access to internet connectivity. Add on modules enable customization solutions for different industry and individuals alike. ASSi makes its customized software modifications available for use on an in-house client server for a one-time development and deployment fee in addition to the annual license fee. License fees are paid monthly, quarterly or annually on a subscription-type basis, depending on the the terms of the purchase agreement negotiated.

milestones.description: A Sound Strategy Receives $30K Loan from Ben Franklin Technology Partners of Northeastern Pennsylvania
milestones.source_description: A Sound Strategy Receives $30K Loan from Ben Franklin Technology Partners of Northeastern Pennsylvania
